DOC.detailed_description: Gonadotropins use fertility treatment intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) vitro fertilization ( IVF ) . These fertility medication give injection contain follicle-stimulating hormone ( FSH ) alone combine luteinizing hormone ( LH ) . During regularly occur menstrual cycle , FSH LH produce pituitary gland brain naturally stimulate ovary make single egg month . When FSH and/or LH give injection fertility treatment , work directly ovary make multiple follicle cyst contain egg . Injections gonadotropin start early ( usually third day ) menstrual cycle cause multiple egg grow mature size . Close monitoring patient ultrasound blood usually need monitoring . The ultrasound measure size ovarian follicle . Blood usually draw every day daily ( total 12 day average ) measurement Estradiol ( E2 ) , progesterone ( P4 ) , luteinizing hormone ( LH ) . The measurement E2 , P4 LH intend quantify response ovary daily injectable gonadotropin . When follicle grow large size ( usually 18 mm ) , human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) , another injectable medication , use trigger maturity egg perform egg retrieval IVF cycle . Instead injectable gonadotropin , study us nasal gonadotropin ( Menopur ) order evaluate safety efficacy woman undergo IVF .
